roles.name: Investigator
roles.team: Town: Get rid of the Mafia and serial killer
roles.description: You are the investigator, you have the ability to investigate a player at night, the investigation would return 3 possible roles, one being true and others being false.

roles.name: Lookout
roles.team: Town: Get rid of the Mafia and serial killer
roles.description: You are the lookout, you have the ability to spy on someone's home, it will allow you to see who visited their house.

roles.name: Sheriff
roles.team: Town: Get rid of the Mafia and serial killer
roles.description: You are the Sheriff, you have the ability to investigate a player, the investigation would return either not suspisious or suspisious

roles.name: Potion Master
roles.team: Town: Get rid of the Mafia and serial killer
roles.description: You are the master of potions, you have the ability to use potions, you have 1 poison potion to kill and 3 healing potions to save someone or yourself once.

roles.name: Whisperer
roles.team: Town: Get rid of the Mafia and serial killer
roles.description: You are a physcic medium, you have the ability to communicate with the dead at night.

roles.name: Escort
roles.team: Town: Get rid of the Mafia and serial killer
roles.description: You are the escort of the town, you are able to occupy someone at night, stopping them from doing an action.

roles.name: Mafiaso
roles.team: Mafia: Get Rid of all the townsfolks and deranged serial killer
roles.description: You are the Mafiaso of the mafia gang, you are responsible for executing the orders of the mafia

roles.name: Framer
roles.team: Mafia: Get Rid of all the townsfolks and deranged serial killer
roles.description: You are the Framer of the mafia gang, you have the ability to frame a player and make them suspisous.

roles.name: Disguiser
roles.team: Mafia: Get Rid of all the townsfolks and deranged serial killer
roles.description: You are the disguiser of the mafia gang, you have the ability to disguise as a different role and prevent unwanted attention from the sheriff and investigator.

roles.name: Serial Killer
roles.team: Self: Kill all townsfolk and mafia members
roles.description: You are the crazy serial killer, you have the ability to kill anyone at night.

roles.name: Survivor
roles.team: Self: Survive until a party wins
roles.description: You are the survivor, you main objective is to survive.

roles.name: Jester
roles.team: Self: You have lost hope in life, you wish to be hanged by the townsfolk
roles.description: You are the jester, after one too many a failed comedy actm you have become the joke, and you wish to have the last laugh.
